remarks.format:
## Remarks A<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>已經<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>包含<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>從手寫筆和潀糔蠮回收物件。 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>來自訂<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>。
## Examples 下列範例會覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法來繪製每個圓形<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>組成<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>。 如果<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A>屬性設定為`true`，則<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.GetBezierStylusPoints%2A>方法傳回的手寫筆點。 否則，<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPoints%2A>屬性傳回的手寫筆點。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection Reformat(class System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription subsetToReformatTo) cil managed
Public Function Reformat (subsetToReformatTo As StylusPointDescription) As StylusPointCollection

Docs.param: A to intersect with the of the current .
Docs.summary: Finds the intersection of the specified and the property.
Docs.returns: A that has a that is a subset of the specified and the that the current uses.

remarks.format:
## Remarks `subsetToReformatTo` 已<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>描述的值屬於子集<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A>屬性。 使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetCommonDescription%2A>方法來取得<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>的交集<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A>目前的<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>。
<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Reformat%2A>方法會傳回<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>包含相同<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>物件做為屬於目前<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>。 <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>在新的物件<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>會使用`subsetToReformatTo`做為<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>。
> [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Reformat%2A> 使用從條件約束<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo>的<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A>屬性，即使中的條件約束`subsetToReformatTo`不同。 例如，如果`subsetToReformatTo`會使用值 0 到 1023年<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure>而<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A>會使用 0 到 255 的值。 <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Reformat%2A> 傳回<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>使用值 0 和 255 之間。
## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立新<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>使用不同<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>。
[!code-csharp[PacketSpy#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PacketSpy/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#17)] [!code-vb[PacketSpy#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PacketSpy/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#17)]
